author: Rebecca Klar
title: Massachusetts governor extends stay-at-home advisory through May 4
description: Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker (R) extended the stay-at-home advisory in his state through the first week of May. The original order, which closes all nonessential businesses and limits social...
content:
Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker (R) extended the stay-at-home advisory in his state through the first week of May. 
The original order, which closes all nonessential businesses and limits social gatherings to 10 people, took effect last week and was set to … [+920 chars]
